entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of drizzle mixed with rain. High plus 4 except 9 inland.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle or rain ending near noon then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. High plus 4 except 9 inland. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Wednesday 04 May 2016
